reproducible example:

inputs = tf.unstack(inputs, num=num_steps, axis=1)

I am trying out ptb_word_lm.py provided with tensorflow itself. In the middle of the code a commented out portion provides a suggested improvement to the code. I am trying that suggestion. The line of code above is already provided by the original version of the ptb_word_lm.py but commented.My entire code is:
